titleStmt.title: [A note] of the head-lands of England [as] they [beare] one from another, agreeing with the plot of the description of the countrey, with their seuerall distances, as followeth.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
Milton, Thomas, fl. 1605.
England and Wales. High Court of Admiralty.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
"Bearings of headlands, certified by 13 pilots [before the High Court of Admiralty] and map on separate sheet."--Crawford. Tudor and Stuart proclamations, no. 1012.
Bodleian copy accompanied by different map in ms. Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: torn at head with several words lacking.
Item at reel 1270:27 identified as STC 10019; the same item appears at reel 1320:6 identified as STC 17940 (number cancelled).
Reproductions of original in the Bodleian Library.
